```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(modelr)
library(mgcv)

# install packages 
install.packages("SemiPar")
library(SemiPar)
```

```{r}
data(lidar)

lidar_df = 
  lidar |> 
  as_tibble() |>
  mutate(id = row_number())

lidar_df |> 
  ggplot(aes(x = range, y = logratio)) + 
  geom_point()
```
